flawed_nl_solution:
The length of the box is 3 x the height of 12 inches = <<3*12=36>>36 inches.
The width of the box is 36 inches / 4 = <<36/4=9>>9 inches.
The volume of the box is the height of 12 inches x the length of 36 inches x the width of 9 inches = <<12*36*9=8388>>8388 cubic inches.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3888.0, not 8388.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
